value:
All civilization was sadness from the
start. One man's climb based on
another man's fall. It must end.

Equality and quietude! They're my two
great wishes for my world. We need
only surrender it to dragons.

Talk is pointless. But deeds make a
difference. Difficult deeds most of all.
Now, what have you and I in common?

Does your world still teem with
humans? Then, no doubt, it knows
nothing but the horror of war.

You may wonder what I am doing,
standing here, right now. I am waiting
for time to pass—peacefully.

You may bow. I have come to
deliver greetings from
$Nf.

My dream further unfurls its
great wings!

More power, yes. But that is
my least concern.
I suppose I am...only human.

My Eckesachs yearns for greater
battles!

I am Zephiel, King of Bern. I hope you
aren't one of those types who spouts
nonsense about hope for humanity.

I've long had the conviction that
humanity had no more worth
than the least of all fleas.$k$pAnd then...you.$k$pYour deeds here, and those of
the others... Every good act has
whittled at my certainty.$k$pWhat I am saying is that you
have earned my attention.
Still, be careful.$k$pThe last person to toy with my
respect was my father. Ultimately,
I had to put an end to him.$k$pNow, you have a throat. And I,
a hand. Let us hope the two
never have need to meet.
むんっ！
ぬぅん！
うおおっ！
Impossible...
Hmmmmph!
You won't get in my way!
I'll face you!
How amusing!
I lost...?!
Hmph.
What could you possibly want of me?
I have absolutely no tolerance for impertinence.
You...are like an infant. Take that any way that you will.
Humanity...is grotesque.
Pointless. All of it. Utterly pointless.
My world must be freed. Humanity, expunged.
Sometimes I see...myself in you. In days when I was...younger.
Hmm?
Now...
Yes?
